title: 'Must buy product'
body: 'Good product product and having perfect capacity size i.e. moderate which can be used for office/gym/sports purposes.'

title: 'Product is not good for kid'
body: 'As it is fallen from my kids hand the cap get broken...what is use of paying such money'

title: 'Does NOT keep the water HOT.'
body: 'The product is convenient to handle easy to carry and use good looking no leakage. But it DOES NOT KEEP THE WATER as WARM as I expected. Otherwise a good purchase. As a started using i was hesitatnt to proceed with a return. Delivery was faster than expected.'

title: 'Does not retain hot temperature.'
body: 'Build quality is good but does not retain hot temperature water gets cool soon.  I tried in winter summer and rainy seasons I carry this bottle to office daily'

title: 'It leaks!'
body: 'User experience of 3 years The bottles slightly leaks. You would find droplets on the upper part of the bottle after sometime. The water retains its temperature for 6-8 hours which is fine.'

title: 'Itâ€™s a very good product'
body: 'Easy to carry water or any fluids temp is well maintained as u needed. My whole family uses them after my usage of the product.'

title: 'Worst bottle ever'
body: It doesn't keep water hot even for an hour.... Please don't buy this. Go for Milton, if you want best vaccum insulated bottle.

title: 'Good'
body: 'Good packing and good product'

title: 'excellent product'
body: 'i love it colour quality everything is perfect'

title: 'smell persisting- we have to discard it finally. tried washing it several times by several means.'
body: 'smell persisting- we have to discard it finally. tried washing it several times by several means.'

title: 'Look good but working is not good'
body: 'Colour is good but working is not good of bottle.'

title: 'Leakage through the cap and poor customer care support'
body: 'Flask is leaking through the cap.  Update: Contacted customer care for warranty with all evidence. No response since a month.'

title: 'Poor quality'
body: 'Need improvement Very very bad product Need more attention'

title: 'Awesome Product'
body: I like this bottle. This bottle as promised that the leak proof and hot is hot or cold is cold for long hour.its must for me while traveling,in summer I carry this bottle for my office and cold water for 18 hour it's really great product love this

title: 'Keeps water warm for long'
body: 'Nice looking bottle keeps water warm for almost 6-7 hr'

title: 'Nice product'

title: 'Great product.'
body: 'Very nice water bottel to use in all the seasons. Great product easy to carry nice color cost effective. I recommend it.'

title: 'Value for money'
body: 'Keeps cools or hot for long time. Easy knobs perfect to carry. Stylish. Great quality. I bought two. First one was 800 now price increased to 935'

title: 'Compact and Easy to carry'
body: Amazing product. Compact and a perfect size to carry. Product quality is good. Though doesn't keep water warm for long

title: 'The Best Water bottle'
body: I've been using this bottle for over an year now and this is by far the best thing I bought of Amazon. I'd highly recommend it. It keeps warm water warn and cold water cold plus the bottle is a little heavy and can be used as a means for self defence also.

title: 'Lid broken and no replacement available'
body: 'After a month of usage my lid broke accidentally I tried contacting borosil local suppliers and seller but no answer canâ€™t find a replacement'

title: 'Hot water does not remain hot for very long n therefore not very useful.'
body: Water doesn't remain hot for very long as compared to other steel thermos.

title: Doesn't keep temperature
body: It doesn't do the job. While looks and spill proof are good qualities to have, it doesn't keep liquids hot or cold for long. Maybe 2-3 hours thats all. Temperature normalises very fast and hence its useless for the purpose

title: 'Doesnâ€™t keep water warm'
body: 'Doesnâ€™t keep water warm for more than 2 hours'

title: 'Cap was broken within 7months. No response from borosil team'
body: 'Broken in 6 months and when mailed  they just chose to ignore'

title: 'The product is sooo classy'
body: First of all I love the color and shape of the bottle. It keeps my drink hot the entire day. It's definitely leak proof and easy to carry. Buy it

title: 'It is very much useful for home and travel. Also good for school going kids.'
body: 'User friendly design. Excellent product for home and travel. Good for school children'

title: 'Good quality and leak proof'
body: It's easy to carry as well. So far it's good.

title: 'Wrong information provided in product description'
body: 'Its not insulated. It doesnâ€™t keep water hot for 14 hours as it claims in description'

title: Pls dnt buy it doesn't hold the hot water not more then 2 hours just go for bold fit on Flipkart
body: 'Feature are dislike and Amazon is getting playing diplomatic on return policy'

title: 'Gud one but not recommended for kids.'
body: Everything is okay but it's plastic Handel break easily so have to Handel with care....not gud for kid's...

title: 'Good for gym!'
body: 'The bottle is good and keep the water cool for long. The outside paint started to chip off which i did not like. Rest everything is fine.'

title: 'Sturdy and good quality'
body: 'Using it fir daily commute to office. Very good quality and easy to use bottle'

title: 'Very good drinking water bottle'
body: 'Love the design. It has fallen down couple of times but sturdy. Love to use this. Only complain would be the quantity could have been bigger at this price point. Overall good for office and gym. Quantity not good enough for long travels.'

title: 'Cool'
body: 'I always get a compliment when I carry this around'

title: 'Purposeful'
body: 'Serves the purpose of sportyeasy handling and thermal protection'

title: 'Genius design. awesome quality
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars'this bottle has a small cap and the special thing about it is that the screw rings are inside the cap not outside. so when u take a sip from it , there won't be some drops stuck in the outer rings that wet the outer part of the bottle . instead water drops remain inside the nozzle. I absolutely love this.

title: 'Good'
body: 'Good'

title: 'Amazing Product. Fully Satisfied.'
body: 'It is up to the mark as mentioned in the description. Been using it for a month now and m fully satisfied with the product.'

title: 'Its good'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. Value of money'

title: 'Thoroughly disappointed'
body: 'This bottle fails to keep water hot for 3-4 hours. Cools off like a normal bottle. Waste of money'

title: 'Works only for 2 hours'
body: 'It keeps the water cool only for 1-2 hours. Leakage proof mechanism is not good it Do leak. Overall plastic material of cap not upto the mark. I strongly recommend you to not go for it.'

title: 'Nice sturdy powder coated water bottle'
body: 'Nice sturdy water bottle. Quality is like any other Borosil product very very nice. The cap and the handle surely will not get damaged unless the water bottle falls from a distance.'
